reviews.review: its fun
Szczerze? Nigdy w to jeszcze nie grałem, zajeło mi to 4 godziny żeby przejść Portala, osobiście chciałbym nie pochwalić twórców za chujowe outro z ciastem polecam Jacek Soplica

Portal é um jogo simples porém bem construído, com puzzles que desafiam e estimulam a raciocinar. Curioso que a personagem principal não tem uma fala sequer e todo o enredo e desenvolvido por outro personagem. Um dos melhores jogos que já experimentei.

Моя самая любимая игра после Portal 2. Сюжет... его здесь особо и нет. Геймплей игры мне нравится. Он завязан на решении головоломок то есть прохождении тестовых камер. Из названия ясно что с помощью порталов. Я считаю эту игру обязательной для прохождения. 10 из 10.

Aún hoy sigue vigente la mecánica del Juego. 
Sonoramente no envejeció correctamente, pero no lo desmerece en ningún punto.
Quizás lo desilucionante es su breve duración, de a momentos incluso dilatada por la velocidad de desplazamiento del personaje, y no por la estructura del juego. 
Sin embargo es un excelente juego de ingenio, sin demasiada complejidad para los adultos (y por ende pocas frustraciones), que te puede dar algunas horas de disfrute.

Portal-- Portal-- Portal-- Where to begin?
A pure classic. I will admit, not as good as it's own sequel, but not many games are. Portal is an immersive, puzzle-filled little bunch of joy. I enjoyed every bit from the boss fight to the puzzles. The graphics are lacking a bit today, but the game was released in 2007, so chill. 
Portal is just Fun. There's no other word for it, it's a fun game. Nothing extravagant, but it's just great. 
A solid 8.6/10

Super bon jeu, assez marrant avec le robot.
Et pour la fin: [spoiler] c'est très triste la mort du robot, qu'au début on considère comme un ami, puis un ennemi et enfin un vrai amis, en voyant le gâteau et sa petite chanson :( [/spoiler] je vais faire le deuxième, j'espère qu'il sera aussi bon voir même meilleur.
Great puzzle/adventure game to sharpen your mind, so fun, great story. I also recommend Portal 2 as it is more fun too!!!!

Portal used to be  a fantastic little game. 

For some bizarre reasons, Valve thought it would be a good idea to add little radios that play loud, annoying low-fi music in all the test chambers after you've completed the game once. This completely ruins the game's ambience on a second playthrough. Why isn't there a simple option to disable radios in the game's option menu?

Shame on Valve.
As everyone says when referring to Portal, this game is one of gaming's greatest milestones. Play it if you haven't already.

Still holds up pretty well despite being a game that was released more than a decade ago, thanks to its brilliantly innovative concept. Graphics and controls feel a bit dated, and the game is pretty short, but the mere originality of its concept helps cement its status as a timeless classic among puzzle games. There's not much replay value, like most puzzle games, but the game isn't that expensive considering its acclaim, and it is often on sale, anyway, so it's definitely worth checking out for the unique experience it offers.
Pretty good innit

Short, cheap but a very fun experience, makes you want more.
Can run on a toaster and still looks very good. Must have game in your library!
Can't wait for my cake!

They should definitely have students play this game in class to learn physics or something, it's probably the most fun game I've ever played where I also feel like i'm learning useful skills. The lore is awesome and I love how it flows into the second game, and even intertwines with the Half life series. Surprising amount of replayability, and I guess the only con is that its a bit short and doesn't involve as many game mechanics as the second game. 9/10
